item.description:
Hi everyone,

Kelly and I would like to schedule a regular lore night at our place. As alliteration would have it, we'd like to do the third Thursday (thord Thorsday?) of every month. Ideally we'll try and pick a piece of lore (either a short tale, or a section of a specific saga, etc) with plenty of time for people to read it.

So for this lore night (insert edit now that we've decided on chapters) we're going to cover chapters 1-17 of the Saga of Burnt Njal.  For the March lore night we'll do chapters 18-51 (there are a lot of short 1-paragraph chapters).  See the comments below where Mike talks about what's in each section.

So regardless, we'll host people at our place on the third Thursday of the month and we'll figure out food before then. We can always do pizza or takeout.

group.name: Connecticut & Western Mass Asatru Meetup Group

item.name: Monthly Lore Night at the Shire
